plot: Part two picks up where part one left off. Hosted by Bravo's Andy Cohen, the ladies of the OC, Tamra Barney, Alexis Bellino, Gretchen Rossi, Peggy Tanous, and Vicki Gunvalson get together to set the record straight on some of the most talked-about antics of the season and answer some of America's most burning questions.—Anonymous
